reviews.sentence: Excellent hotel at the sea. Excellent hotel at the sea friendly staff very clean and with a nice cozy atmosphere. We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights over new years eve and even though it seemed to be full it was not noisy at l.

Great location. Close to coast bus train shopping dining. View of the coast was gorgeous. Staff concern for well being was greatly appreciated as visit to Denmark from the US was to attend a family funeral.
Nice and clean place. Good staff good food Location clean and nice room. All good.

Felt very welcome in a hotel with great location. I loved the breakfast the staff was very friendly parking was excellent location is lovelythe toilet did not flush well I would like to have had more facilities in the room.

Nice Experience. It was a nice experience. the hotel is 20 km or 30 min outside Copenhagen but if you are by car or like take the public transportation to stay in this hotel is a good idea. ask for the 4th floor with view to the sea. really great sceneThe breakfast it is really amazing.

Very friendly and warm staff lovely view from rooms at the front. Relatively well located for the meeting I had outside of Copenhagen. Very nice view of the sea and I imagine lovely in the summer. I was there on a wet and windy October night so did not get full experience but pleasant enough in the morning. No comment here.
efterars tur til vedvaek. Marina need to UPGRADE bathroom very much to be known as a top class hotel. Environment and public rooms very good.
Will be returning. Very friendly helpful staff. Great value for money and good breakfast included. N A.
Great view great breakfast OK room value for money. Great breakfast. Breakfast stops at 10 am.
Denmarks gem of a hotel. wonderfully helpful reception staff available 247 I was at the hotel for 18 days and it was warm welcome and a home away from home.
location breakfaststaf not helpful upon our question of hughe price difference upon booking we were offered Ã¢â€Â¬ per room and we ended up paying almost Ã¢â€Â¬ in the hotel.

Return extremely unlikely. It was the only hotel available in CopenhagenOutrageous price per night for an inferior outdated room where the bathroom desperately needed an upgrade. No restaurant no tea coffee facilities in the room and all for the bargain price of £ 250 per nightSher profiteering including the bar when manned where prices were eye watering. I appreciate that the hotel was in a unique situation of trying to cater for rooms where the rest of Copenhagen was full with a vast medical conference but this was way over the top. Not to be repeated.

Location is great but bathroom is outdated and not clean. Room is very basic with no service and windows barely close correctly. Owners of this hotel should invest in fixing and cleaning the rooms. Otherwise the restaurant is nice.

The hotel downstairs is very nice both in appearance and ambiance. However the rooms seem neglected harsh and boring. The bathroom washbasin was cracked looking almost ready to shatter. The toilet was badly stained looking very disgusting. The walls and floors in the room were bare of pictures and carpets. The room obviously had a fridge mini bar at one time but alas no more. Only one easy chair in a two persons room. Light from the corridor shined in around the entrance door all night. However the TWIN beds were very comfortable. Generally speaking the rooms are very 70s and need refurbishing.
Nice location outside Copenhagen. The Hotel is in bad shape. The room was not so nice the toalet was old and in bad shape.

Friendly and polite staff rooms need to be renovated. Good. is great but would obviously cost a lot of money to renovate. The propery owner is taking over as of January 3rd as I understand. was good. The hotel could be an upscale hotel looks great from the outside. is polite and friendly too soft mattresses etc. It used to be a grand hotel. I saw it in 1965 when it was new. Property could do with an overhaul. Worn interior in.
We was told that there was a kitchen when it only was a tea kitchen. The toilet would not flush aswel and the beds where terrible. Everything was faded. Sad story.

Modern hotel near the sea and the train station. Fast and friendly reception. Next to it is a bar and the restaurant for breakfast maybe also other mealtimes. The hallway and the room numbering are a bit confusing but I always found my room. The bed was comfortable the TV has several channels only one german free WLAN. For breakfast there are a lot of cereals beans and sausages pancakes eggs sliced fruits and vegetables danish pasteries and bread. it is a bit expensive 130 Euro per night but everything is expensive in denmark.

Good. Location north of Copenhagen by the beach and a pleasure port and easy drive off the motorway to Elsinore. One receptionist very helpful. My room 432 had dark grey ceiling walls curtains and carpet and black tables too much dark. No fridge no telephone and no airco.

Shocking. The bathroom reminded me of the bathroom of a hostel in Egypt I visited 30 years ago. The smell of the sewer gas transported me in time. Flies all over the breakfast buffet. Very unappetizing. This is such a tired old hotel. It ’s a wonder it stays in business.
